languages.text: "Вот как выглядят верные своему сюзерену слуги! Вперед, мои подданные, защитите своего Лорд-капитана!"

traits.locale_text: "Взгляни — так выглядят верные своему сюзерену слуги! Вперед, мои подданные, защитите Вольного Торговца!"
"Вот как выглядят верные своему сюзерену слуги! Вперед, мои подданные, защитите своего Лорд-капитана!"

languages.text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "Вот как выглядят верные своему сюзерену слуги! Вперед, мои подданные, защитите своего Лорд-капитана!"

traits.locale_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"
"This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"
"This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"
"This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

languages.text: “这才是忠于主人的仆人该有的样子！上吧，我的臣民们，保护你们的领主舰长！”
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: “这才是忠于主人的仆人该有的样子！上吧，我的臣民们，保护你们的领主舰长！”

languages.text: «¡Estos son sirvientes leales a su soberana! ¡Adelante, súbditos, proteged a vuestra Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Estos son sirvientes leales a su soberana! ¡Adelante, súbditos, proteged a vuestra Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: 「これこそが宗主の忠実なるしもべの姿よ！進め、我が臣民よ、ロード・キャプテンを守るのだ！」
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: 「これこそが宗主の忠実なるしもべの姿よ！進め、我が臣民よ、ロード・キャプテンを守るのだ！」

languages.text: "So sehen Diener aus, die ihrem Lehnsherrn treu ergeben sind! Geht nun, meine Untertanen. Beschützt euren Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "So sehen Diener aus, die ihrem Lehnsherrn treu ergeben sind! Geht nun, meine Untertanen. Beschützt euren Lord Captain!"

languages.text: « Voilà à quoi ressemblent des serviteurs fidèles à leur suzeraine ! Aux armes, mes sujets, protégez votre seigneure-capitaine ! »
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà à quoi ressemblent des serviteurs fidèles à leur suzeraine ! Aux armes, mes sujets, protégez votre seigneure-capitaine ! »

languages.text: "Derebeyine sadık hizmetkârlar böyle olur! İlerleyin kullarım, Lord Kaptan'ınızı koruyun!"
languages.original_text: "This is what servants loyal to their suzerain look like! Go forth, my subjects, protect your Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Derebeylerine sadık hizmetkârlar böyle olur! İlerleyin kullarım, Lord Kaptan'ınızı koruyun!"
